languages.text: Эльдары с погибшего мира-корабля Крудараха, некогда бороздившие тьму Простора в отчаянной надежде собрать остатки своего народа, встречались все реже. Даже самые умелые агенты Касбаллики и нахальные охотники за головами, что знали о поселениях ксеносов на окраинах Простора, более не могли выйти на их след. Отряды эльдарских рейнджеров появлялись на разных мирах и так же внезапно исчезали, не верша кровопролития. Что замышляли ксеносы, осталось загадкой.

Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.
languages.original_text: Эльдары с погибшего мира-корабля Крудараха, некогда бороздившие тьму Простора в отчаянной надежде собрать остатки своего народа, встречались все реже. Даже самые умелые агенты Касбаллики и нахальные охотники за головами, что знали о поселениях ксеносов на окраинах Простора, более не могли выйти на их след. Отряды эльдарских рейнджеров появлялись на разных мирах и так же внезапно исчезали, не верша кровопролития. Что замышляли ксеносы, осталось загадкой.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari from the fallen craftworld of Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and the most audacious bounty hunters, who knew of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared in different worlds, and disappeared abruptly, shedding no blood. What they were planning, remained an enigma.

Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared in different worlds, and disappeared abruptly, shedding no blood. What they were planning, remained an enigma.

Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

languages.text: 那些来自陨落的方舟世界克鲁达拉赫的艾达灵族，他们在科罗努斯扩区的黑暗之中绝望地旅行，试图找到他们幸存的同胞。而现在，他们的痕迹变得愈发罕见，即便是最老练的卡斯巴利卡特工或最大胆的赏金猎人，或是对扩区边缘的异形定居点了如指掌的猎手，也无法发现他们的踪迹。人们只知道，艾达灵族的游侠小队突然出现在各个世界，随后又突然消失，没有引发任何冲突。他们的目的仍然是个谜。
languages.original_text: Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

traits.locale_text: 那些来自陨落的方舟世界克鲁达拉赫的艾达灵族，他们在科罗努斯扩区的黑暗之中绝望地旅行，试图找到他们幸存的同胞。而现在，他们的痕迹变得愈发罕见，即便是最老练的卡斯巴利卡特工或最大胆的赏金猎人，或是对扩区边缘的异形定居点了如指掌的猎手，也无法发现他们的踪迹。人们只知道，艾达灵族的游侠小队突然出现在各个世界，随后又突然消失，没有引发任何冲突。他们的目的仍然是个谜。

languages.text: Aeldari vom gefallenen Weltenschiff Crudarach, das in der Dunkelheit der Ausdehnung einst verzweifelt nach Überresten seines Volkes gesucht hatte, waren immer seltener anzutreffen. Selbst die fähigsten Kasballica-Agenten und verwegensten Kopfgeldjäger, die von Xenos-Siedlungen am Rande der Ausdehnung wussten, konnten ihre Fährte nicht mehr aufnehmen. Truppen von Aeldari-Weltenläufern erschienen plötzlich auf anderen Welten und verschwanden ebenso abrupt wieder, ohne einen einzigen Tropfen Blut zu vergießen. Was sie dort bezweckten, bleibt ein Mysterium.
languages.original_text: Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

traits.locale_text: Aeldari vom gefallenen Weltenschiff Crudarach, das in der Dunkelheit der Ausdehnung einst verzweifelt nach Überresten seines Volkes gesucht hatte, waren immer seltener anzutreffen. Selbst die fähigsten Kasballica-Agenten und verwegensten Kopfgeldjäger, die von Xenos-Siedlungen am Rande der Ausdehnung wussten, konnten ihre Fährte nicht mehr aufnehmen. Truppen von Aeldari-Weltenläufern erschienen plötzlich auf anderen Welten und verschwanden ebenso abrupt wieder, ohne einen einzigen Tropfen Blut zu vergießen. Was sie dort bezweckten, bleibt ein Mysterium.

languages.text: Les Aeldaris de Crudarach, qui sillonnaient autrefois les ténèbres des Étendues dans l'espoir insensé de réunir les survivants de la destruction de leur vaisseau-monde, se firent de plus en plus rares. Même les plus habiles agents de la Kasballica et les audacieux chasseurs de primes, qui avaient pourtant connaissance des colonies xénos des confins, ne parvinrent bientôt plus à retrouver leur trace. Cependant, des escouades de rangers aeldaris firent soudain leur apparition sur différents mondes, puis se volatilisèrent tout aussi brusquement sans verser la moindre goutte de sang. Le but de ces visites demeura à jamais une énigme.
languages.original_text: Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

traits.locale_text: Les Aeldaris de Crudarach, qui sillonnaient autrefois les ténèbres des Étendues dans l'espoir insensé de réunir les survivants de la destruction de leur vaisseau-monde, se firent de plus en plus rares. Même les plus habiles agents de la Kasballica et les audacieux chasseurs de primes, qui avaient pourtant connaissance des colonies xénos des confins, ne parvinrent bientôt plus à retrouver leur trace. Cependant, des escouades de rangers aeldaris firent soudain leur apparition sur différents mondes, puis se volatilisèrent tout aussi brusquement sans verser la moindre goutte de sang. Le but de ces visites demeura à jamais une énigme.

languages.text: Los avistamientos de Aeldari del mundo astronave caído Crudarach, que antaño recorrían la oscuridad de la Extensión en un intento desesperado de reunir a los restos desperdigados de su especie, se volvieron cada vez más escasos. Ni siquiera los agentes más hábiles ni los cazarrecompensas más audaces de la Kasballica, que conocían los asentamientos xenos en los límites de la Extensión, podían dar con su rastro. Escuadrones de exploradores Aeldari aparecían de repente en distintos mundos y desaparecían con la misma velocidad, sin derramar ni una gota de sangre. Nunca se descubrió su propósito.
languages.original_text: Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

traits.locale_text: Los avistamientos de Aeldari del mundo astronave caído Crudarach, que antaño recorrían la oscuridad de la Extensión en un intento desesperado de reunir a los restos desperdigados de su especie, se volvieron cada vez más escasos. Ni siquiera los agentes más hábiles ni los cazarrecompensas más audaces de la Kasballica, que conocían los asentamientos xenos en los límites de la Extensión, podían dar con su rastro. Escuadrones de exploradores Aeldari aparecían de repente en distintos mundos y desaparecían con la misma velocidad, sin derramar ni una gota de sangre. Nunca se descubrió su propósito.

languages.text: 堕落した方舟のクルダラからやってきたアエルダリは、かつて自分たちの種族の残骸を集めようと必死にエクスパンスの暗闇を旅していたが、その姿は珍しくなっていた。 最も巧みなカスバリカ諜報員や大胆なハンターでさえ、エクスパンスの端にあるゼノの居住地を知っていたが、もはや彼らの足跡を見つけることはできなかった。一滴の血も流さずに、アエルダリ・レンジャーの部隊は突如として異なる世界に現れ、突然姿を消した。彼らの目的は謎のままだった。
languages.original_text: Aeldari from the fallen craftworld Crudarach, who once travelled through the darkness of the Expanse in a desperate attempt to gather the remains of their kind, were becoming a rarer sight. Even the most skilful Kasballica agents and audacious bounty hunters, with knowledge of xenos settlements on the edges of the Expanse, could no longer find their trail. Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.

traits.locale_text: 堕落した方舟のクルダラからやってきたアエルダリは、かつて自分たちの種族の残骸を集めようと必死にエクスパンスの暗闇を旅していたが、その姿は珍しくなっていた。 最も巧みなカスバリカ諜報員や大胆なハンターでさえ、エクスパンスの端にあるゼノの居住地を知っていたが、もはや彼らの足跡を見つけることはできなかった。一滴の血も流さずに、アエルダリ・レンジャーの部隊は突如として異なる世界に現れ、突然姿を消した。彼らの目的は謎のままだった。

languages.text: Düşmüş gemidünya Crudarach'tan gelen ve bir zamanlar türlerinden geriye kalanları bulma amacıyla Enginlik'in karanlığında umutsuzca seyahat eden Aeldariler giderek daha nadir görülmeye başlamışlardı. Enginlik'in ücra kesimlerindeki zeno yerleşim yerleri hakkında geniş bilgiye sahip olan yetenekli Kasballica ajanları ve gözü pek ödül avcıları bile izlerini bulamıyordu. Aeldari kolcu mangaları farklı dünyalarda aniden ortaya çıkıyor, ardından tek bir damla kan dökmeden ansızın yok oluyorlardı. Amaçları bir sır olarak kaldı.

Squads of Aeldari rangers suddenly appeared on different worlds and disappeared abruptly without shedding a drop of blood. Their purpose remained an enigma.
